005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.util.ModuleUtils;
009
010import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
011
012/**
013 * A base class for a field definition defined globally within a Metaschema
014 * module.
015 *
016 * @param <MODULE>
017 *          the Java type of the containing module
018 * @param <INSTANCE>
019 *          the expected Java type of an instance of this definition
020 * @param <FLAG>
021 *          the expected Java type of flag children
022 */
023public abstract class AbstractGlobalFieldDefinition<
024    MODULE extends IModule,
025    INSTANCE extends IFieldInstance,
026    FLAG extends IFlagInstance>
027    extends AbstractGlobalDefinition<MODULE, INSTANCE>
028    implements IFieldDefinition, IFeatureContainerFlag<FLAG> {
029
030  /**
031   * Construct a new global field definition.
032   *
033   * @param module
034   *          the parent module containing this definition
035   */
036  protected AbstractGlobalFieldDefinition(@NonNull MODULE module) {
037    super(module, name -> ModuleUtils.parseModelName(module, name));
038  }
039}
